title: Atmospheric and Oceanic CO2 Levels and the Effects

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the effect of increased atmospheric carbon dioxide on marine organisms?

choices.label: It will increase the ocean \(pH\) outside of the tolerance range of most fish.
It will increase the solubility of oxygen, increasing gas exchange in marine organisms.
It will decrease the availability of carbonate ions in ocean water, decreasing the ability of coral to form shells.
It will decrease the temperature of the ocean water, decreasing the rate of photosynthesis in phytoplankton.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
